title: Austin Sharrah
text: This is my personal website where you can find my information on academics, projects I have worked on, as well as my resume.

title: Projects
text: I am currently a Senior At Colorado State University, perusing my Bachelor’s degree in Ecosystem Science and Sustainability. I look to peruse a career in Wildlife law enforcement after gradation. Below you will find a link to the Alexander Mountain Fire. I was able to assist in evacuations and area patrol during this fire.

title: My Current Resume
text: Education August 2023- Present Colorado State University, Fort Collins, CO- Ecosystem Science and Sustainability I am currently pursuing my Bachelor’s degree in Ecosystem Science and Sustainability expecting to graduate December of 2025. August 2022- May 2023 Laramie County Community College, Cheyenne, WY- Natural Resources I completed my Associate’s degree in Natural Resources at Laramie County Community College. Skills The skills I will be able to contribute are: Problem solving and critical thinking Teamwork Public speaking and informing individuals Customer service Park and Regulation knowledge Experience April 2023 - November 2024 Larimer County - Park Ranger Interact and educate with park visitors Patrol the park and provide service where it is needed. Enforce rules and regulations within the park. April 2022 - November 2022 Larimer County - ANS inspector Provide information on invasive species Clean and decontaminate vessels May 2018 - August 2021 Greeley Country Club - Lifeguard Customer Service Patron Safety Awards I was honored with the Ranger of the Month award in July 2024 from Larimer County Additionally, I received the Satisfactory Achievement Award in my Agricultural Economics course for demonstrating proficiency in Excel spreadsheets.
